body_html:
Okay I tried, or am I doing it wrong:

conda create -n pyto python=3.5 -y
activate pyto

conda install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing pandas seaborn plotly scipy statsmodels jupyter notebook cython -y
pip install cufflinks 
pip install sklearn 
conda install -c conda-forge tbb -y

cd C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch

set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11

set LIB=C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\Library\lib;%LIB%

python setup.py install

The outcome is still the same:

"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (4) ->
(Link Ziel) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: Datei "tbb.lib" kann nicht ge÷ffnet werden. [C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2
\apply_utils_test.vcxproj]


"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (25) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: Datei "tbb.lib" kann nicht ge÷ffnet werden. [C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2
\tbb_init_test.vcxproj]

    355 Warnung(en)
    2 Fehler

Verstrichene Zeit 00:07:07.59

(pyto) C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build>IF NOT 1 == 0 exit 1
Failed to run 'tools\build_pytorch_libs.bat --with-nnpack caffe2 nanopb libshm_windows'

Thanks!

body:
Okay I tried, or am I doing it wrong:

```
conda create -n pyto python=3.5 -y
activate pyto

conda install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing pandas seaborn plotly scipy statsmodels jupyter notebook cython -y
pip install cufflinks 
pip install sklearn 
conda install -c conda-forge tbb -y

cd C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch

set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11

set LIB=C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\Library\lib;%LIB%

python setup.py install
```

The outcome is still the same:

```
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (4) ->
(Link Ziel) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: Datei "tbb.lib" kann nicht ge÷ffnet werden. [C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2
\apply_utils_test.vcxproj]


"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj" (Standardziel) (25) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: Datei "tbb.lib" kann nicht ge÷ffnet werden. [C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build\caffe2
\tbb_init_test.vcxproj]

    355 Warnung(en)
    2 Fehler

Verstrichene Zeit 00:07:07.59

(pyto) C:\Users\Gabi\Downloads\pytorch\build>IF NOT 1 == 0 exit 1
Failed to run 'tools\build_pytorch_libs.bat --with-nnpack caffe2 nanopb libshm_windows'
```

Thanks!
